xbrlcore.instance
Class Instance

java.lang.Object
  xbrlcore.instance.Instance
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Instance
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents an XBRL instance document as it is described in the XBRL 2.1 Specification, which can be obtained from http://www.xbrl.org/SpecRecommendations/

Author:
Daniel Hamm
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Instance

public Instance(java.util.Set discoverableTaxonomySet)
Constructor.

Parameters:
discoverableTaxonomySet - Set of discoverable taxonomy sets this instance refers to.
Method Detail

addDiscoverableTaxonomySet

public void addDiscoverableTaxonomySet(DiscoverableTaxonomySet dts)
This method adds a discoverable taxonomy set and all its namespaces to this instance object.

Parameters:
dts -

setTaxonomyNamespaces

public void setTaxonomyNamespaces()
Adds namespaces from all imported taxonomies to this Instance object.

addFact

public void addFact(Fact newFact)
             throws InstanceException
Adds a fact to the instance. This method only works if either the context this fact refers to is already available or if this fact refers to a context at all. In the latter case, the context is added to the instance.

Parameters:
newFact - The fact which is added to the instance.
Throws:
InstanceException - This exception is thrown if the fact does not refer to a context. Also, the exception is thrown if some information in the fact or the context is missing.

addContext

public void addContext(InstanceContext newContext)
                throws InstanceException
Adds a new context to the instance. Each context with the same ID can only be added once to an instance, an exception is thrown if newContext is already part of this instance.

Parameters:
newContext - The context which is added to the instance.
Throws:
InstanceException - This exception is thrown if a context with that ID is already part of the instance or if some information within the context is missing.

addUnit

public void addUnit(InstanceUnit newUnit)
             throws InstanceException
Adds a new unit to the instance. Each unit with the same ID can only be added once to an instance, an exception is thrown if newUnit is already part of this instance.

Parameters:
newUnit - The unit which is added to the instance.
Throws:
InstanceException - This exception is thrown if a unit with that ID is already part of the instance or if some information within the unit is missing.

getContext

public InstanceContext getContext(java.lang.String id)
Returns a context with a specific ID. If the context is not available, NULL is returned.

Parameters:
id - ID of the context.
Returns:
InstanceContext object if available, otherwise NULL.

getUnit

public InstanceUnit getUnit(java.lang.String id)
Returns a unit with a specific ID. If the unit is not available, NULL is returned.

Parameters:
id - ID of the unit.
Returns:
InstanceUnit object if available, otherwise NULL.

getFactsForContext

public java.util.Set getFactsForContext(java.lang.String context_id)
Returns a list of Facts which refer to a certain context.

Parameters:
context_id - ID of the context the returned facts refer to.
Returns:
List of facts which refer to a certain context.

getFact

public Fact getFact(Concept primaryElement,
                    InstanceContext ctx)
Returns the fact for a specific concept and a context.

Parameters:
primaryElement - The primary element the fact refers to.
ctx - The specific context the fact refers to.
Returns:
The according reported fact.

getFact

public Fact getFact(Concept primaryElement,
                    MultipleDimensionType mdt,
                    int scen_seg)
Returns the fact for a specific concept and a dimension/domain combination this fact is reported for.

Parameters:
primaryElement - The primary element the fact refers to.
mdt - Dimension/domain combination the fact is reported for.
scen_seg - Determines whether the dimensional information of the or element of the context is taken. To specify them, please use the constants DIM_SCENARIO and DIM_SEGMENT of xbrlcore.constants.GeneralConstants.
Returns:
The according reported fact.

getContext

public InstanceContext getContext(MultipleDimensionType mdt,
                                  int scen_seg)
Returns the context for a specific dimension/domain combination which is part of that context.

Parameters:
mdt - Dimension/domain combination of the requested context.
scen_seg - Determines whether the dimensional information of the or element of the context is taken. To specify them, please use the constants DIM_SCENARIO and DIM_SEGMENT of xbrlcore.constants.GeneralConstants.
Returns:
The according context.

removeFact

public void removeFact(Fact factToRemove)
Removes a fact from the instance.

Parameters:
factToRemove - Fact which shall be removed.

removeFact

public void removeFact(Concept primaryElement,
                       MultipleDimensionType mdt,
                       int scen_seg)
Removes a fact from the instance.

Parameters:
primaryElement - The primary element the fact refers to.
mdt - Dimension/domain combination the fact is reported for.
scen_seg - Determines whether the dimensional information of the or element are taken. To specify them, please use the constants DIM_SCENARIO and DIM_SEGMENT of xbrlcore.constants.GeneralConstants.

getNamespaceURI

public java.lang.String getNamespaceURI(java.lang.String namespacePrefix)
Returns the URI of a certain namespace prefix.

Parameters:
namespacePrefix - The namespace prefix which the URI is desired for.
Returns:
The according namespace URI to the given prefix.

getNumberOfFacts

public int getNumberOfFacts()
Returns:
Number of facts of this instance.

getNumberOfContexts

public int getNumberOfContexts()
Returns:
Number of contexts of this instance.

addNamespace

public void addNamespace(java.lang.String namespace_prefix,
                         java.lang.String namespace_uri)
Adds a namespace to the namespace list.

Parameters:
namespace_prefix - Prefix of the new namespace.
namespace_uri - URI of the new namespace.

addNamespace

public void addNamespace(org.jdom.Namespace newNamespace)
Adds a namespace to the namespace list

Parameters:
newNamespace - New Namespace.

getNamespace

public org.jdom.Namespace getNamespace(java.lang.String namespaceURI)
This method gets a namespace according to a specific URI.

Parameters:
namespaceURI - The URI of the namespace.
Returns:
The namespace which belongs to the specific schema file.

getSchemaForPrefix

public TaxonomySchema getSchemaForPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
This method returns the correct taxonomy for a specific namespace prefix. So if the prefix replaces namespace n within the instance, the taxonomy is returned which has a targetNamespace of n.

Parameters:
prefix - The prefix of the namespace.
Returns:
Returns the according taxonomy schema which describes a specific (target)namespace.

getSchemaForURI

public TaxonomySchema getSchemaForURI(org.jdom.Namespace ns)
This method returns the correct taxonomy for a specific namespace. So the taxonomy is returned which has a targetNamespace of ns.

Parameters:
ns - The namespace for which the correct schema is returned.
Returns:
Returns the according taxonomy schema which describes a specific (target)namespace.

addSchemaLocation

public void addSchemaLocation(java.lang.String schemaURI,
                              java.lang.String schemaName)
Adds a new schema location to the instance.

Parameters:
schemaURI - URI of the new schema location.
schemaName - Name of the new schema location, that is the name of the schema file.

getContextMap

public java.util.Map getContextMap()
Returns:
Set with all the contextes in this instance (key - ID of the context, value - according InstanceContext object).

getFactSet

public java.util.Set getFactSet()
Returns:
List with all the facts in this instance.

getDiscoverableTaxonomySet

public java.util.Set getDiscoverableTaxonomySet()
Returns:
All taxonomies this instance refers to.

getAdditionalNamespaceSet

public java.util.Set getAdditionalNamespaceSet()
Returns:
Set with all the additional namespaces of the instance document. This is a list of JDOM Namespace objects.

getInstanceNamespace

public org.jdom.Namespace getInstanceNamespace()
Returns:
Namespace of the instance document.

setInstanceNamespace

public void setInstanceNamespace(org.jdom.Namespace namespace)
Parameters:
namespace -

getSchemaLocationMap

public java.util.Map getSchemaLocationMap()
Returns:
Map which contains schema location information. Key is the schema URI, value is the schema name.

getUnitMap

public java.util.Map getUnitMap()
Returns:
Map which contains unit informaion. Key is the ID of the unit, value is the according xbrlcore.instance.InstanceUnit object.

getFileName

public java.lang.String getFileName()
Returns:
Returns the fileName.

setFileName

public void setFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
Parameters:
fileName - The fileName to set.

getComment

public java.lang.String getComment()
Returns:
Returns the comment.

setComment

public void setComment(java.lang.String comment)
Parameters:
comment - The comment to set.
